des:
Meet the ConnectLife. SmartLiving IoT platform that connects people, appliances, and services from all Hisense group brands to simplify user's life. With the ConnectLife skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your ConnectLife enabled devices by voice. Alexa can help you preheat your oven when your hands are busy preparing the food. You can ask her to change the temperature on your Air conditioner when you are relaxing on the sofa. Or just ask your dishwasher what is the status of your dishes, when you need more clean dishes for your party. 
 
Currently the skill works with enabled Hisense Split air conditioners, Portable air conditioners, Window air conditioners and Dehumidifiers. The rest of the home appliances will come soon! 

To get started, first download ConnectLife mobile application and pair your appliance there. Then select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your ConnectLife account and discover your devices. 

When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. They are shown in the ConnectLife app and can be changed. 

Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following: 
 

"Alexa, turn on Bedroom AC" 
"Alexa, set Bedroom AC temperature to 72 degrees" 
“Alexa, what is the temperature in Bedroom AC” 
“Alexa, increase Bedroom AC temperature” 
“Alexa, increase Bedroom AC temperature by 5 degrees” 
“Alexa, set Bedroom AC to Cool”
